items.title: Show HN: Novel AI – AI Story Generator& Book Maker
items.raw_excerpt: Hi HN, I built a simple "AI Story Generator app" to help users create stories, books, novels, or short creative writing pieces with the help of AI. Features: - AI-powered story generation - Choose genres like fantasy, horror, romance, or sci-fi - Generate stories based on custom prompts - Export and share easily Why I built it: I noticed many people (especially casual writers and students) struggle with writer’s block or just want to play with creative storytelling. This app tries to make that easier and more fun. I’d love feedback from the HN community: - Which features would make an AI story app more valuable for you? - Any suggestions for improving the user experience? - Would you prefer more control (plot structure, characters) or more

This app tries to make that easier and more fun. items.title: Show HN: Mimir Crypto – AI crypto news aggregator and analysis
items.raw_excerpt: Hi, my name is Timothy and I recently created a couple of AI agents for analyzing cryptocurrencies, e.g. creating 6-month outlooks [1]. These agents are just searching Google for the latest news for a particular coin, which is expensive (token-heavy) and slow, and they often miss significant news, especially if it's not very recent. Existing crypto news aggregator APIs are expensive and doesn't (afaik) include any analysis such as sentiments, meaning I would still have to scrape and analyze the articles myself. So I decided to create my own crypto news aggregator that uses AI (LLM) to analyze each news article. The website is different than other crypto news aggregators in that it ranks the coins/tokens by how much media attention they are getting, together with their sentiments and latest

title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Mimir Crypto – Agregador y analizador de noticias de criptomonedas con IA

excerpt_i18n.en: Hi, my name is Timothy and I recently created a couple of AI agents for analyzing cryptocurrencies, e.g. creating 6-month outlooks [1]. These agents are just searching Google for the latest news for a particular coin, which is expensive (token-heavy) and slow, and they often miss significant news, especially if it's not very recent. Existing crypto news aggregator APIs are expensive and doesn't (afaik) include any analysis such as sentiments, meaning I would still have to scrape and analyze the articles myself. So I decided to create my own crypto news aggregator that uses AI (LLM) to analyze each news article. The website is different than other crypto news aggregators in that it ranks the coins/tokens by how much media attention they are getting, together with their sentiments and latest

items.title: Ask HN: Production deployed full AI generated applications
items.raw_excerpt: AI has been in the main limelight ever since the "Vibe Coding" term gets spoken by everyone. I know and have used it across. With the recent business uprising of fixing the vibe coding issues, has anyone created any full blown end-to-end AI coded applications that is deployed to somewhat production ready requirements? Would like to know the experiences unlike what is available in the market and on the internet about the issues and how to use it, where it can be useful etc., etc., but more from the actual usage based honest feedback on the whole end-to-end perspective. I know it might take the discussion across multiple viewpoints, but ....

title_i18n.en: Ask HN: Production deployed full AI generated applications
title_i18n.zh: 问HN：已部署生产环境的全AI生成应用
title_i18n.es: Pregunta HN: Aplicaciones completamente generadas por IA desplegadas en producción

items.title: How do devs see the value of AI coding tools like Cursor or the $200 ChatGPT?
items.raw_excerpt: Hi all, I’ve been talking with a friend who doesn’t code but is raving about how the $200/month ChatGPT plan is a god-like experience. I’m tech-literate but not a full-time developer (I did some data science years ago), and I’m more of moderate views about what these tools can actually do and where the real value lies. Here’s my current take, based on my own use and what I’ve seen on forums: • People who don’t usually write code but are comfortable with tech: They get quick wins, they can suddenly spin up a landing page or a rough prototype. But the value seems to plateau fast. If you can’t judge whether the AI’s changes are good, or reason about the quality of its output, a $200/month plan doesn’t feel worthwhile. You can’t tell if the hours it spends coding are producing something solid.

title_i18n.en: How do devs see the value of AI coding tools like Cursor or the $200 ChatGPT?
title_i18n.zh: 开发者如何看待Cursor或200美元的ChatGPT等AI编程工具的价值？
title_i18n.es: ¿Cómo perciben los desarrolladores el valor de herramientas de codificación con IA como Cursor o el ChatGPT de 200 dólares?

excerpt_i18n.en: Hi all, I’ve been talking with a friend who doesn’t code but is raving about how the $200/month ChatGPT plan is a god-like experience. I’m tech-literate but not a full-time developer (I did some data science years ago), and I’m more of moderate views about what these tools can actually do and where the real value lies. Here’s my current take, based on my own use and what I’ve seen on forums: • People who don’t usually write code but are comfortable with tech: They get quick wins, they can suddenly spin up a landing page or a rough prototype. But the value seems to plateau fast. If you can’t judge whether the AI’s changes are good, or reason about the quality of its output, a $200/month plan doesn’t feel worthwhile. You can’t tell if the hours it spends coding are producing something solid.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好，我和一位不会编程的朋友聊过，他盛赞每月200美元的ChatGPT套餐简直是神级体验。我懂技术但并非全职开发者（几年前做过一些数据科学相关的工作）
excerpt_i18n.es: Hola a todos, he estado hablando con un amigo que no programa pero alaba la experiencia divina del plan de ChatGPT de 200 dólares al mes. Tengo conocimientos técnicos pero no soy desarrollador a tiempo completo (hace años hice algo de ciencia de datos),

items.title: 马斯克称到11月X的算法将完全由AI驱动
items.raw_excerpt: 马斯克表示，到11月，其社交媒体平台X所使用的算法将完全由人工智能（AI）驱动。马斯克称：“到11月时，算法将完全由人工智能驱动，并且在此过程中会取得重大进展。我们每隔两周左右就会公开算法的源代码。到11月或者最晚12月，你只需向 Grok 发出指令，就能动态地调整你的信息流了。（新浪财经）

title_i18n.zh: 马斯克称到11月X的算法将完全由AI驱动
title_i18n.en: Musk stated that by November, X's algorithm will be entirely AI-driven.
title_i18n.es: Musk afirma que para noviembre el algoritmo de X estará completamente impulsado por inteligencia artificial.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 马斯克表示，到11月，其社交媒体平台X所使用的算法将完全由人工智能（AI）驱动。马斯克称：“到11月时，算法将完全由人工智能驱动，并且在此过程中会取得重大进展。我们每隔两周左右就会公开算法的源代码。到11月或者最晚12月，你只需向 Grok 发出指令，就能动态地调整你的信息流了。（新浪财经）
excerpt_i18n.en: Musk stated that by November, the algorithm used by his social media platform X will be entirely driven by artificial intelligence (AI). Musk said: "By November, the algorithm will be fully AI-driven, and significant progress will be made in the process. We publicly release the algorithm's source code approximately every two weeks. By November or at the latest December, you will be able to dynamically adjust your information feed simply by giving commands to Grok." (Sina Finance)
excerpt_i18n.es: Musk indicó que para noviembre, el algoritmo de su plataforma de redes sociales X estará completamente impulsado por inteligencia artificial (IA). Musk afirmó: "Para noviembre, el algoritmo estará totalmente dirigido por IA y se lograrán avances significativos en el proceso. Publicamos el código fuente del algoritmo aproximadamente cada dos semanas. Para noviembre o, como muy tarde, diciembre, podrás ajustar dinámicamente tu flujo de información simplemente dando instrucciones a Grok. (Sina Finance)

items.title: 华为联合六家企业发布面向制造等行业的AI创新解决方案
items.raw_excerpt: [中国，上海，2025年9月19日] 华为全联接大会2025期间，在制造与大企业峰会上，华为联合广汽集团、美云智数、国地共建人形机器人创新中心（以下简称“国地中心”）、正大CP AXTRA、联发集团、中国海诚工程科技股份有限公司，发布六大行业AI创新解决方案，为全球制作、零售、建筑地产等多个行业领域提供数智化跃升实践样板，加速驱动AI驱增长动能。   华为联合多家伙伴发布AI创新解决方案 当数据成为核心生产要素、智能成为竞争关键变量，如何用好AI已经成为企业的一道必答题。行业中的领军企业正在通过场景聚焦、小步快跑的方式推进 AI 落地，经过一年多的实践证明，AI为企业创造的价值，正以超出预期的速度持续刷新认知。 峰会期间，六家企业与华为共同发布了面向行业的AI创新成果，这些方案均在实践中得以验证并取得良好表现，旨在助力更多企业加速AI落地。 广汽与华为联合的云车机解决方案：依托华为云“CloudDevice”重构车机算力及生态边界，以开放平台打破传统车机封闭壁垒。助力广汽实现汽车座舱屏幕体验升级； 美云智数与华为联合的AIGC（Artificial Intelligence Generated Content，生成式人工智能）智能化解决方案：基于华为昇腾底座，融合美云智数数字平台与智能化应用，打造一站式“出厂即用”企业智能化解决方案，解决企业AI落地难题，降低开发门槛，整合分散能力，加速场景应用，助力企业提质增效； 国地共建人形机器人创新中心与华为联合的异构人形机器人工业服务场景训练场方案：基于华为昇腾算力底座、华为云meadow数据仿真、云存储等华为全栈式能力，完成具身训练场从0到1，与1到N的孵化； 正大CP AXTRA与华为联合的边缘算力智慧零售方案：基于华为Atlas 300V Pro联合伙伴实现边缘AI一体方案，赋能CP AXTRA智

title_i18n.zh: 华为联合六家企业发布面向制造等行业的AI创新解决方案
title_i18n.en: Huawei, in collaboration with six enterprises, has launched AI innovation solutions targeting industries such as manufacturing.
title_i18n.es: Huawei, junto con seis empresas, lanzó una solución innovadora de inteligencia artificial dirigida a sectores como la manufactura.

excerpt_i18n.zh: [中国，上海，2025年9月19日] 华为全联接大会2025期间，在制造与大企业峰会上，华为联合广汽集团、美云智数、国地共建人形机器人创新中心（以下简称“国地中心”）、正大CP AXTRA、联发集团、中国海诚工程科技股份有限公司，发布六大行业AI创新解决方案，为全球制作、零售、建筑地产等多个行业领域提供数智化跃升实践样板，加速驱动AI驱增长动能。   华为联合多家伙伴发布AI创新解决方案 当数据成为核心生产要素、智能成为竞争关键变量，如何用好AI已经成为企业的一道必答题。行业中的领军企业正在通过场景聚焦、小步快跑的方式推进 AI 落地，经过一年多的实践证明，AI为企业创造的价值，正以超出预期的速度持续刷新认知。 峰会期间，六家企业与华为共同发布了面向行业的AI创新成果，这些方案均在实践中得以验证并取得良好表现，旨在助力更多企业加速AI落地。 广汽与华为联合的云车机解决方案：依托华为云“CloudDevice”重构车机算力及生态边界，以开放平台打破传统车机封闭壁垒。助力广汽实现汽车座舱屏幕体验升级； 美云智数与华为联合的AIGC（Artificial Intelligence Generated Content，生成式人工智能）智能化解决方案：基于华为昇腾底座，融合美云智数数字平台与智能化应用，打造一站式“出厂即用”企业智能化解决方案，解决企业AI落地难题，降低开发门槛，整合分散能力，加速场景应用，助力企业提质增效； 国地共建人形机器人创新中心与华为联合的异构人形机器人工业服务场景训练场方案：基于华为昇腾算力底座、华为云meadow数据仿真、云存储等华为全栈式能力，完成具身训练场从0到1，与1到N的孵化； 正大CP AXTRA与华为联合的边缘算力智慧零售方案：基于华为Atlas 300V Pro联合伙伴实现边缘AI一体方案，赋能CP AXTRA智
excerpt_i18n.en:
Shanghai, China, September 19, 2025 — During the Huawei Connect 2025 conference at the Manufacturing and Large Enterprise Summit, Huawei, together with GAC Group, Midea Cloud Intelligence, the National Humanoid Robot Innovation Center (referred to as the National Center), CP AXTRA, Lianfa Group, and China Haisum Engineering Co., Ltd., launched six industry AI innovation solutions. These provide digital and intelligent transformation models for global manufacturing, retail, construction, real estate, and other sectors, accelerating AI-driven growth momentum.

Huawei and multiple partners released AI innovation solutions. As data becomes a core production factor and intelligence a key competitive variable, effectively utilizing AI has become essential for enterprises. Leading companies are advancing AI adoption through scenario focus and rapid iteration. Over a year of practice has shown that AI creates value for businesses at an unexpectedly fast pace, continuously reshaping perceptions.

During the summit, six enterprises and Huawei jointly unveiled industry-specific AI innovations, all validated in practice with strong performance, aimed at helping more companies accelerate AI implementation.

GAC and Huawei's joint cloud vehicle infotainment solution: Leveraging Huawei Cloud's "CloudDevice" to redefine infotainment computing power and ecosystem boundaries, using an open platform to break traditional closed barriers. It enhances the in-car screen experience for GAC.

Midea Cloud Intelligence and Huawei's joint AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) solution:
excerpt_i18n.es: China, Shanghái, 19 de septiembre de 2025. Durante la Cumbre de Fabricación y Grandes Empresas en la Conferencia Connect de Huawei 2025, Huawei, junto con GAC Group, Midea Cloud, el Centro de Innovación de Robots Humanoides Guodi (en adelante, Centro Guodi), CP AXTRA, Link Real Estate Group y China Haisum Engineering, presentó seis soluciones innovadoras de IA para diversos sectores. Estas ofrecen modelos de práctica para la transformación digital e inteligente en fabricación global, retail, construcción e inmobiliario, acelerando el impulso de crecimiento basado en IA. Huawei y múltiples socios lanzan soluciones innovadoras de IA. Los datos se convierten en el núcleo de la producción.

items.title: Distillation Can Make AI Models Smaller and Cheaper
items.raw_excerpt: A fundamental technique lets researchers use a big, expensive model to train another model for less.

title_i18n.en: Distillation Can Make AI Models Smaller and Cheaper
title_i18n.zh: 蒸馏技术可使AI模型更小更便宜
title_i18n.es: La destilación puede hacer que los modelos de inteligencia artificial sean más pequeños y baratos.

excerpt_i18n.en: A fundamental technique lets researchers use a big, expensive model to train another model for less.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 一项基础技术让研究人员能够利用大型昂贵模型以更低成本训练另一个模型。
excerpt_i18n.es: Una técnica fundamental permite a los investigadores utilizar un modelo grande y costoso para entrenar otro modelo con menos recursos.
